name: Legend Of Arcadia
description:
How to download and play:

  1. Download ZIP file.
  2. Extract to any folder you would like.
  3. Find and run the .exe (Executable File "Game.exe").
  4. Enjoy the game.

Game details:

  • Gameplay time: 25+ hours
  • Controller Support and Keyboard/Mouse Support.
  • This game has a long linear storyline!
  • Battles get more difficult as the game goes on.
  • It is recommended not to rush and take your time exploring the World of Arcadia!

Game Description:

The contenent of Arcadia is split up into to sections: Idripia Isle and Arcadia.

These two areas are spry with a bunch of different areas, towns, Islands and dungeons.

Explore the world of Arcadia and collect treasures, allies, visit shops and towns as the story starts to unfold slowly.
